qcv1

Class GroverGateByGate

  • java.lang.Object
    • qcv1.GateByGateCircuit
      • qcv1.GroverGateByGate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QCircuit

    public class GroverGateByGate
extends GateByGateCircuit
    An implementation of quantum search algorithm (Grover's algorithm). This is a gate-by-gate circuit of the Grover's diffusion operation
    Author:
    Michael Chiang

      • GroverGateByGate

        public GroverGateByGate(java.lang.String rep,
                int[] targetIndices,
                int numOfQbits,
                boolean guiUpdate)
        Create the Grover circuit
        Parameters:
        rep - Representation of the gate (complex matrix, sparse matrix, functional)
        targetIndices - The target/solution states of the search problem
        numOfQbits - Number of qubits required
        guiUpdate - Whether or not to update the gui
